General.Name: Lingyun Ind
General.Description: Ling Yun Industrial Corporation Limited engages in the production and sale of metal, automotive plastic, and plastic piping systems in China. It also offers battery case, fusion fittings, winding pipe, decorative steels, front and rear shaft, front and rear bumper beams, nylon pipe, cab suspension system, side door anti-collision beam, and body stamping welding parts. The company was formerly known as Lingyun Auto Parts Co., Ltd. Ling Yun Industrial Corporation Limited was founded in 1995 and is based in Zhuozhou, China.
